full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

#### Tender Details

* **Tender Reference Number:** PW-22-01006333
* **Title:** NSN: 4820-21-9060524 Gate Valve
* **Procurement Category:** Goods (GD)
* **Tender Method:** Competitive - Open bidding
* **Tender Status:** Expired

#### Sourcing and Delivery Details

* **Department of National Defence:** Request for Proposal
* **Items Sourced:** 2 sets of gate valves, NSN: 4820-21-9060524, manufactured by VELAN INC
* **Contract Name:** W8482-230743/B
* **Contract Duration:** Not specified
* **Delivery Locations:** CFB Halifax, Nova Scotia, and CFB Esquimalt, British Columbia
* **Delivery Unit:** Each (EA)

#### Bidding Requirements

* **Language**: Bids may be submitted in either official language of Canada
* **Currency**: Bids must be submitted in Canadian dollars
* **Product Equivalent or Substitute**: Bidders proposing an equivalent or substitute product must indicate brand name and model, Part Number, and NCAGE
* **Bid Submission**: Documents may be submitted electronically

#### Trade Agreements

This RFP is subject to the following free trade agreements:
* Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
* Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
* Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
* Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
* Canada-UK Trade Continuity Agreement (Canada-UK TCA)
* Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
* Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
* Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)

#### Contracting and Contact Information

* **Contracting Entity:** Department of National Defence
* **Contact Person:** Matthew Lengacher
* **Email:** matthew.lengacher@forces.gc.ca
* **Phone:** 819-939-3725

#### Documents

The following amendments and documents are available for download:
* [Google Drive Link to English RFP and Clauses][1]
* [Google Drive Link to French RFP and Clauses][2]
* [Google Drive Link to Amendment 2][3]
* [Google Drive Link to Amendment 1][4]
